Add accountability report feature and prepare for Vercel deployment

- Update API endpoints to support both KV and in-memory storage
- Replace emojis with Unicode symbols throughout UI
- Add staff and faculty CSV files for categorization
- Create server.js for local development
- Create generate-dummy-data.js for testing
- Update vercel.json with accountability route
- Add .vercelignore file
